ch.uzh.ddis.katts.query.processor.filter
Class TripleFilter

java.lang.Object
  ch.uzh.ddis.katts.query.AbstractNode
      ch.uzh.ddis.katts.query.processor.filter.TripleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, TripleFilterConfiguration, ProducerConfiguration, Node, ProducerNode, java.io.Serializable
public class TripleFilter
extends AbstractNode
implements ProducerNode, TripleFilterConfiguration

A triple filter does build the variable bindings from a triple stream (output of an Source Node. The filtering can be done based on some conditions (see setConditions(List)).

Author:
Thomas Hunziker
See Also:

getParallelism

public int getParallelism()
Description copied from interface: Node
This method returns the parallelism for this node.
  • parallelism < 1: means that the node is parallelizable. The system determines by itself how much.
  • parallelism = 1: means that the node is not parallelizable.
  • parallelism > 1: means that the system will create the given number of nodes (bolts / spouts).

Specified by:
getParallelism in interface Node
Returns:
